price: Monka kasa a emu dwoͻ nkyerε no, na ebia ͻbεfa afutuo no, anaasε ͻbesuro (Nyame).
arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faqūlā lahu qawlan layyinan laʿallahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhshā
